555770.name: The Sandbox Evolution - Soundtrack
555770.description:
The Sandbox Evolution: The Soundtrack by Petr Yakyamsev

All tracks available as 320kbp/s MP3 files in the The Sandbox Evolution "Soundtrack" game folder on your PC. The files are INSIDE the computer. More information on the The Sandbox Evolution soundtrack and Petr Yakyamsev can be found here: http://www.headshotlab.com

01 - Evolution
02 - Neighborhoods
03 - Fujin Story
04 - Caveman Rush
05 - Avatar Action
06 - Introduction to Sandbox
07 - Creating the Worlds 1
08 - Creating the Worlds 2
09 - Creating the Worlds 3
10 - Pixel Art
11 - Ghostbusters Evolution
12 - Ghostbusters Boss
13 - Lasers
14 - Ride of the Valkyries
15 - Runners
555770.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
